long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide my Mail!

This tool enables you to hide your mail with automatic alias generation using a custom provider without any additional restriction.
Currently available Provider: Mailcow

You need an own Mailcow instance to be able to use this extension. Create an API-Key in the dashboard and disable IP-Restriction (you can keep this active when your client has a static ip address).
All Requests happen from your device to your Mailcow instance.

--
If you have any suggestion to what providers to include (can think of an exchange implementation or the new cloudflare mail service once they get an api).
Feel free to contact me via e-mail at info@reptoxx.com

Public issue tracker:
https://github.com/ReptoxX/Hide-my-Mail-Issue-Tracker/issues
